devdoc.details: The allowance target for the TokenSpender feature.

executeCall(address,bytes).details: Execute an arbitrary call. Only an authority can call this.

returns.resultData: The data returned by the call.

params.index: Index of target in authorities array.

transferOwnership(address).details: Change the owner of this contract.
